data.name: MAZE RUNNER Demo
data.detailed_description:
How it feels to be lost? Can’t find an exit. Very soon you’ll know the adventure of MAZE RUNNER.

Mike is in an unknown situation to get away from the maze, he must find the three orbs that works like a key to unlock the exit. In this way he would need to fight with mysterious enemies whom they won’t let him finish the maze.
